sentence.translation: When they were disputing, a stranger wearing a cloak came
sentence.french: Alors qu'ils se disputaient, un étranger vêtu d'un manteau est venu

sentence.utterance: dɪ wʊ ɟɪ́ kʰá nʊɔ a só ntɛ́ kɛ́ kɔɔ púnó-nẽ a cʊʊ kpákpáár-dáá=ꜜrá dɪ-ɪ ti ɔ́ɔ̀ cĩ́ncẽ ntɛ́=ꜜrá hánã́-nĩ fãŋɡá ɟɔ ule

sentence.gloss: c1 3pl agree recip mouth and say person dem.dist pst be.able-re 3sg make stranger-one=DEF c1-expl 3sg.poss cloth person=DEF have-ni strong superl dem.dist
sentence.translation: Then they agreed together and said the person who would be able to make the stranger remove his cloak is the person who has more strength than the other
sentence.french: Puis ils se mirent d'accord et dirent que la personne qui serait capable de faire retirer son manteau à l'étranger était celle qui avait plus de force que l'autre.

sentence.utterance: dɪ ɡɔ̃ɡʊɔ̃n ɟɪɛ pʰʊ́ʊ́ʊ́ ná faŋɡá tó-r nákɛ

sentence.gloss: c1 mountain wind blow with strength hard-re emph
sentence.translation: The North Wind blew very hard with all his strength
sentence.french: Le Vent du Nord soufflait très fort de toutes ses forces

sentence.utterance: sɪ a á pʰʊ́ʊ́ ná faŋɡá dɪ kpákpáár-dáár=ꜜrá kʰɪm ɔ́ɔ̀ tṍmbi na cĩcĩ́n=ꜜná

sentence.gloss: c2 when 3sg blow with strength c1 stranger-one=DEF tighten 3sg body with cloak=DEF
sentence.translation: But when he blows very hard, the stranger tightens the cloak around his body
sentence.french: Mais quand il souffle très fort, l'inconnu resserre la cape autour de son corps.

sentence.utterance: a cʊ́ʊ́ mɪ̃́ɪ̃́ɪ̃́ a vɔɔ a fáá

sentence.gloss: 3sg do emph to be.tired to abandon
sentence.translation: He (the wind) did it a lot until, at last, he got tired and abandoned it
sentence.french: Il (le vent) l'a fait beaucoup jusqu'à ce qu'il finisse par se fatiguer et l'abandonner.

sentence.utterance: dɪ jiri ɪ̃́ a pʰã́ kpákpákpá dɪ kpákpáár-dáár=ꜜrá ti ɔ́ɔ̀ cĩcẽ́ pʊrpʊr

sentence.gloss: c1 when c1 be-ipfv manner then mountain wind relf say sun have-rel strength superl 2pl
sentence.translation: Then, when it was that way, the North Wind himself said that it was the Sun who has more strength than him
sentence.french: Puis, quand il en fut ainsi, le Vent du Nord lui-même dit que c'était le Soleil qui avait plus de force que lui.

sentence.translation: Hello, good morning to you all.
sentence.french: Bonjour à tous.

sentence.translation: Today I'm going to explain funeral practices in Lobi culture-
sentence.french: Aujourd'hui, je vais vous expliquer les pratiques funéraires dans la culture de Lobi.

sentence.utterance: a tɪ́blɪ́ khi mɔ̃́ lóbi-n cʊʊ
sentence.morphemes: a tɪ́blɪ́ khi mɔ̃́ lóbi-n cʊʊ
sentence.gloss: if person die how Lobi-ipfv do
sentence.translation: what Lobi people do when someone passes away.
sentence.french: ce que font les gens de Lobi quand quelqu'un meurt.

sentence.utterance: a do bɪsã́ã̀ khé sa-n pʊ́ɔ́r=á khí-ré-ꜜrá=a
sentence.morphemes: a do bɪsã́ã̀ khé sa-n pʊ́ɔ́r=á khí-ré-ꜜrá=a

sentence.translation: If it is a kid who passed away, we don't wait long with the body.
sentence.french: Si c'est un enfant qui est mort, on n'attend pas longtemps avec le corps.

sentence.utterance: a khɛ́r-á bɪ dɪ sɪ-n dʊ́ khí-ré-ꜜrá dawí-ra

sentence.gloss: if woman-pl cry dɪ 1pl-ipfv bury die-nmlz-def that.day-loc
sentence.translation: After women cry, we bury the body the same day.
sentence.french: Après que les femmes pleurent, on enterre le corps le même jour.

sentence.utterance: sa-n sá bɪ́nã=ã
sentence.morphemes: sa-n sá bɪ́nã=ã
sentence.translation: We don't dance.
sentence.french: On ne danse pas.

sentence.utterance: sa-n cʊ́ʊ́ thɪ̃́ kontín=ã
sentence.morphemes: sa-n cʊ́ʊ́ thɪ̃́ kontín=ã
sentence.translation: We don't organize a big funeral.
sentence.french: On n'organise pas de gros funérailles.

sentence.utterance: a do tɪ́blɪ́ kóntin jɪ sa-n dʊ́ khí-ré-ꜜrá dawí-ra=a

sentence.translation: If it is an adult, we don't bury the body the same day.
sentence.french: Si c'est un adulte, on n'enterre pas le corps le même jour.

sentence.utterance: sɪ-n cʊ́ʊ́-rɛ́ biir
sentence.morphemes: sɪ-n cʊ́ʊ́-rɛ́ biir
sentence.translation: We organize a funeral.
sentence.french: On organise des funérailles.

sentence.utterance: sɪ-n wé sɪ tóó sʊnɔ̃ dɪ wʊ-n ɪ̃

sentence.translation: We call our community members.
sentence.french: Nous appelons les membres de notre communauté.
